list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long rod or rigid piece of wood, metal, or similar material, typically used as an obstruction, fastening, or weapon.
a counter across which alcoholic drinks or refreshments are served.
a barrier or restriction to an action or advance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: political differences are not necessarily a bar to a good relationship
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sự khác biệt chính trị không nhất thiết là một quán bar cho một mối quan hệ tốt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a measure of music or the time of a piece of music.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the opening bars of the first hymn
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các thanh mở đầu của bài thánh ca đầu tiên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a partition in a courtroom or legislative assembly, now usually notional, beyond which most people may not pass and, in court, at which an accused person stands.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his dismissal from the Singapore Bar
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự sa thải của anh ấy từ quán bar Singapore

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a unit of pressure equivalent to 100,000 newtons per square meter or approximately one atmosphere.
fasten (something, especially a door or window) with a bar or bars.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she bolts and bars the door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô bu lông và thanh cửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: prevent or prohibit (someone) from doing something or from going somewhere.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she is barred from leaving the country
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô bị cấm rời khỏi đất nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his face was barred with light
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khuôn mặt anh bị cấm với ánh sáng
